title: For Caine Prize Winner, Writing Went From Phase To Way Of Life
teaser: The Caine Prize for African Writing was awarded on Monday to Kenyan Okwiri Oduor. Oduor joins guest host Jacki Lyden, along with last year's winner, Tope Folarin, to talk about the prize.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
